String.string: Ask {@linkcreature:240#1050#Fraya} what to do after you find the source of the material.
Bring the morbolith fragment to Ryshan at Mysterium Headquarters in Allemantheia.
Talk to Malachai while Ryshan is busy.
Confirm this change is okay with Ryshan.
Find Fraya in Frontera, and give her your report. (Press to use the teleport scroll you received.)
Speak with {@linkcreature:240#1034#Kaleon} in Arachne's Bane. [Use the {@linkcreature:75#1015#Teleportal} to go to Arachne's Bane.]
Speak with {@linkcreature:239#1100#Kaleon} at Retribution Point in Arachnaea.
Defeat {@linkcreature:39#250#Kaligos} and {@linkcreature:39#260#Telremnas} guarding the morbolith mills.
Activate the {@LinkObject:37#mill}, then pick up a morbolith fragment.
Bring the morbolith fragments to {@linkcreature:239#1050#Kaleon} at the Wary Vigil.
Use the purifying flame on the sanctified mill to destroy it.
Inform {@linkcreature:239#1100#Kaleon} at the Wary Vigil that you destroyed the Sanctified Mill.
Ask Fraya why the research was stopped.
This must be the place you're meeting Fraya.
Go to the {@linkcreature:239#1039#meeting location} at Wary Vigil.
Use the {@linkcreature:239#1040#teleportal} to team up with Fraya in the Hidden Shrine and defeat Brigadier Akeldama.
Speak with {@linkcreature:407#1004#Fraya} in the Hidden Shrine. (If you leave the Hidden Shrine, you can use the {@LinkCreature:239#1040#teleportal} at the entrance to enter it again.)
Return to Allemantheia and speak with Watchman {@linkcreature:72#1134#Alnosk} who is waiting for you at Malachai's Lab.

Use the {@linkcreature:72#1061#teleportal} to enter Malachai's Lab. Tell {@linkcreature:408#1007#Fraya} you're ready, then defeat Thulsa.
[Thulsa appears after you answer Fraya.]
Speak with Fraya inside Malachai's Lab.
